name: silver-assist-security
description: WordPress security plugin that resolves critical security vulnerabilities found in WordPress security audits

scripts.minify: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.minify:css: postcss assets/css/admin.css -o assets/css/admin.min.css && postcss assets/css/password-validation.css -o assets/css/password-validation.min.css && postcss assets/css/variables.css -o assets/css/variables.min.css
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run minify

author: Silver Assist Security Team
